mapper.select: select review_nickname, review_content, to_char(review_date, 'yy-mm-dd') review_date, review_readnum from reviews order by review_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into reviews(review_id, user_id_fk, festival_id_fk, review_nickname, review_content) values(#{uuid}, 1, 1, #{nickname}, #{content})
